Day

day.block_creator(path, block_size)

Combines hourly information on TEC into blocks of information based on user preference

Parameters

  • path (str) – Full path of files

  • block_size (int) – Block size (can be 10 or 100)

Returns

A dictionary whose key has two parts: the first and second parts represent the block and year respectively. Values are Pandas dataframes corresponding to that block and year.

Return type

dict

day.day(files)

Combines hourly information on TEC into blocks of information corresponding to one day

Parameters

files (list) – List of strings of file names

Returns

A dictionary whose keys are day and year, and values are Pandas dataframes corresponding to information from that day and year.

Return type

dict
